trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Table"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Table"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Table"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Table"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Table"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.
A string that contains "Table".
Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Table"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A value from the enumeration.
If patternInterface is , this method returns a `this` pointer; otherwise, this method returns `null`.

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Table"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer"></xref> is understood by the end user as interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement"></xref>.
`true`.
Gets the total number of columns in a grid.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> interface.
The total number of columns in a grid.
Retrieves the UI Automation provider for the specified cell.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> interface.
The ordinal number of the row of interest.
The ordinal number of the column of interest.
The UI Automation provider for the specified cell.
Gets the total number of rows in a grid.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> interface.
The total number of rows in a grid.
